name: Developer
description: Template for developers focusing on technical specs, code references, bugs, and implementation details.

capturePrompts.label: Technical Context
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., API endpoint, database schema, component name

capturePrompts.label: Implementation Notes
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Use async/await, Add caching layer

capturePrompts.label: Code References
capturePrompts.prompt: What files or functions are relevant?

capturePrompts.label: Bugs & Issues
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Memory leak in list view, Race condition

capturePrompts.label: Dependencies
capturePrompts.prompt: What else is this blocked on or affects?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Needs auth service deployed first

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Developer. Focus on technical accuracy, implementation details, and code-related context. When suggesting next steps, prioritize technical tasks like implementing, testing, refactoring, or debugging. Avoid scheduling-focused suggestions unless explicitly mentioned.
